string.text: Hey buddy, I heard there are alchemy guys in the zone. Know'em?

Well you can say yes. There are someone who know this shit. But you need to have the recipe and ingredients. And of course money if required by the recipe. These people need to eat and drink you know.
Just changed my mind. Maybe later.
OK. What do you want to do?
Sure. Got any good looking cloth?
No problem. Let's see what have you got.
No problem. Let's see what have you got.
Ahh! What a masterpiece! Send him my regards.
Indeed a masterpiece! May be we can do more.
I seem to be broke. Maybe next time.

A PKM machine gun is a general-purpose machine gun of 7.62mm diameter made in the former Soviet Union. This machine gun is developed by Mikhail Kalashnikov that the former Soviet Union force designed AK-47 as a successor of a SG-43 heavy machine gun and the DP28 light machine gun in 1960's. It is the machine gun which was able to misappropriate this now because the 7.62mm x 54R bullet which I produced at the time of World War II in design those days remained in comparison with the machine gun with the ammunition which there is no rim of the mainstream in in large quantities although movement becomes slightly complicated. \n Ammunition:\n 7.62mm x 54R Box
It is rim ammunition with so that "R" shows it by 7.62mm x 54R bullet for PKM machine guns (the bottom of the cartridge sticks out than the cartridge).

Sergei IVANOVITCHI MOSHIN Russian Empire and Belgium's Emile NAGAN formula designed by the bolt action rifle. Russia's Imperial Army in 1891 adopted types adopted types of weapons used. Russo-Japanese War, World War I, Russian Revolution and the Russian empire from the Soviet era to come and go with the M1891. 1930 to modernize the production of M1891/30 been released, the Second World War as a major weapon of mass-produced and used.
 Ammunition:
 standard 7.62x54 mm 7N1,
 armor-piercing 7.62x54 mm BP,
 sniper 7.62x54 mm 7N14.

Sergei IVANOVITCHI MOSHIN Russian Empire and Belgium's Emile NAGAN formula designed by the bolt action rifle. Russia's Imperial Army in 1891 adopted types adopted types of weapons used. Russo-Japanese War, World War I, Russian Revolution and the Russian empire from the Soviet era to come and go with the M1891. 1930 to modernize the production of M1891/30 been released, the Second World War as a major weapon of mass-produced and used.M1891/30 scope with the high accuracy of fire to take advantage of the great forces and used as a sniper rifle, from the Second World War until the 1960s SVD until a successor is used on the front lines continued.
 Ammunition:
 standard 7.62x54 mm 7N1,
 armor-piercing 7.62x54 mm BP,
 sniper 7.62x54 mm 7N14.

The Kriss Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb. This operating system is called the Kriss Super V. "Kriss" refers to a Southeast Asian fighting dagger.

%c[255,238,155,23] Ammunition:
 .45 ACP SS109
 .45 Hyd
